PayloadContent.description: This dictionary contains the payload contents

Retries.description: The number of times the device should retry if the server sends a PENDING response

Name.description: Optional. Any string that is understood by the SCEP server. For example, it could be a domain name like example.org. If a certificate authority has multiple CA certificates this field can be used to distinguish which is required.

SubjectAltName.description: Specifies the Subject Alt Name for the certificate

URL.description: The base URL for the SCEP server

Challenge.description: Used as the pre-shared secret for automatic enrollment

RetryDelay.description: The number of seconds to wait between subsequent retries. The first retry is attempted without this delay

KeyUsage.description: A bitmask indicating the use of the ky. 1 - signing, 4 - encryption, 5 - signing and encryption

CAFingerprint.description: Optional. The fingerprint of the Certificate Authority certificate.

GetCACaps.description: If you add a dictionary with the key GetCACaps, the device uses the strings you provide as the authoritative source of information about the capabilities of your CA.

items.description: One item in the array representing a pair of OID and value
An array representing an OID and value pair.
This array holds another array which holds an OID value pair

Subject.description: The representation of a X.500 name represented as an array of OID and value. OIDs can be represented as dotted numbers, with shortcuts for country (C), locality (L), state (ST), organization (O), organizational unit (OU), and common name (CN).

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
